Description.Text:
Property Location
Located in Rome (Aurelio), Hotel Club House Roma is convenient to Vatican Museums and Sistine Chapel. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of St. Peter's Basilica and Piazza del Popolo.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 108 air-conditioned rooms featuring minibars and flat-screen televisions. Satellite television is provided for your entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and bidets. Conveniences include safes and desks, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a rooftop terrace and a garden and make use of amenities such as complimentary wireless Internet access. Additional amenities include a television in the lobby and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is served daily.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include limo/town car service, express check-in, and express check-out. A roundtrip airport shuttle is provided for a surcharge (available on request), and self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite.


Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. A complimentary hot/cold buffet breakfast is served daily.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Located in Rome (Aurelio), Hotel Club House Roma is convenient to Vatican Museums and Sistine Chapel. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of St. Peter's Basilica and Piazza del Popolo.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Istituto Dermopatico dell'Immacolata - 0.4 km / 0.3 mi
San Carlo di Nancy Hospital - 1.2 km / 0.8 mi
Vatican Gardens - 1.8 km / 1.1 mi
Palace of the Governorate of Vatican City State - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Palace of Justice - 2.1 km / 1.3 mi
Casina Pio IV - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Vatican Museums - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Vatican Library - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Sistine Chapel - 2.3 km / 1.4 mi
Villa Doria Pamphili - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Congregation for the Doctrine of the Faith - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Paul VI Audience Hall - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
St. Peter's Basilica - 2.4 km / 1.5 mi
Russian Orthodox Church of Saint Catherine - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi
Apostolic Palace - 2.5 km / 1.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Rome (CIA-Ciampino) - 17.9 km / 11.1 mi
Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.) - 18.9 km / 11.8 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Club House Roma is Rome (FCO-Fiumicino - Leonardo da Vinci Intl.).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The closest major airports to Waldorf B&H are:

Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci) - 18.9 km / 11.8 mi

The preferred airport for Waldorf B&H is Rome (FCO-Leonardo Da Vinci).
